properties.description: Deletes existing records from relational table for this reporting period

typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	CurrentPeriod as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> NewRecords
NewRecords select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDeleteKeys
SelectDeleteKeys derive(Current_Reporting_Period = toTimestamp($CurrentPeriod, 'yyyy-MM-dd')) ~> DerivedColumn1
Aggregate1 alterRow(deleteIf(uniquecount>0)) ~> AlterRow1
DerivedColumn1 aggregate(groupBy(Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Current_Reporting_Period),
	uniquecount = count(0)) ~> Aggregate1
AlterRow1 sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Other_Sale_Id_Old as integer,
		Reporting_Period as date,
		Sale_Type_Code as string,
		Sales_UOM as string,
		Sales_Point as string,
		Total_Units_Sold as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Net_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Sales_Net_Revenue_Per_Unit as decimal(19,4),
		Currency_Code as string,
		Budget_Sales_Quantity as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Sales_Revenue as decimal(19,4),
		Budget_Sales_Cost as decimal(19,4),
		Insert_Datetime as timestamp,
		Update_Datetime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string,
		Sales_Type as string,
		Other_Sale_Id as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:true,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Asset_ID','Fund_ID','Reporting_Period'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Reporting_Period = Current_Reporting_Period
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetRelationalDelete
